name: Donepezil Hydrochloride
indications: donepezil hydrochloride tablets acetylcholinesterase inhibitor indicated treatment dementia alzheimer 's type . efficacy demonstrated patients mild , moderate , severe alzheimer 's disease
contraindications: • mild moderate alzheimer 's disease : 5 mg 10 mg daily ( 2.1 ) • moderate severe alzheimer 's disease : 10 mg daily ( 2.2 )
adverseReactions: • known hypersensitivity donepezil hydrochloride piperidine derivatives ( 4 )
indications_original: Donepezil hydrochloride tablets are an acetylcholinesterase inhibitor indicated for the treatment of dementia of the Alzheimer's type. Efficacy has been demonstrated in patients with mild, moderate, and severe Alzheimer's Disease
contraindications_original: • Mild to Moderate Alzheimer's Disease: 5 mg to 10 mg once daily ( 2.1 ) • Moderate to Severe Alzheimer's Disease: 10 mg once daily ( 2.2 )
adverseReactions_original: • Known hypersensitivity to donepezil hydrochloride or to piperidine derivatives ( 4 )
